title: BloodGore2 SoundEffects
description: This is a brutal horror game sound effects package featuring sounds of blood, entrails, flesh tearing, and skin damage.
longDescription:
Preview.

  • https://youtu.be/WfnSwNra6VQ


This is a brutal horror game sound effects package featuring sounds of blood, entrails, flesh tearing, and skin damage.
